column4: Hi everyone, first time linux/ubuntu user here and was wondering since everything seems to be working just fine in ubuntu... do i have to install drivers for my hardware or did it install itself ?
most drivers are installed automatically, though if you want 3d acceleration on ati/nvidia there is a bit of configuration to do
also some wireless chipsets need extra drivers before they will run, but apart from that most things work out of the box
mp3 cannot be included directly in ubuntu due to licensing issues, read the restricted formats page that ubotu just linked to
